message.body: I'm gonna come back to Lloyd first actually cause I forgot the med I need to take at lunch

Hey guys, Is there a certain time emily showers or will probably be away from her room that we or a few of us could do some door decorating? i remember we talked a little about it at dinner, but i'm not sure if we established anything. if not, perhaps i will just hang out in the common room with supplies and wait for a good time to strike!
